tool_description: Analyzes property characteristics, business licenses, and observable indicators to classify current actual land use, distinguishing between primary and secondary uses.
error_messages: Invalid property data format: Property data must be valid JSON with required fields.
Insufficient classification data: More information needed to accurately classify land use.
Conflicting use indicators: Observable uses conflict with recorded information, manual review required.
usage: Input comprehensive property data along with business licenses and observations to determine actual current land use. Essential for identifying discrepancies with permitted uses.

secondary_uses.description: Any secondary or accessory uses identified

use_category.description: General use category (residential, commercial, industrial, etc.)
